Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen activated his com.  <Beachcomber, bridge, NOW!> he screamed, 
jumping on the grenade as it exploded, blowing him in half.

---

Beachcomber heard the explosion, raising his laser rifle as he charged for 
the bridge.
